jobDescription: We’re looking for a highly motivated, analytical mind to provide analytics services to some of our most strategic clients. As a Data Analyst, you’ll use a combination of business intelligence, web analytics, statistical analysis and data mining techniques to help our clients better understand how their consumers engage with consumer-generated content.As a Data Analyst you should be able to identify and facilitate the measurement of KPIs, collaborate with business users to understand current and future goals and objectives, elicit requirements that may be known or unknown based on the information provided and provide sound recommendations regarding how best to incorporate these requests. You should be passionate about surfacing undiscovered patterns in data and using quantitative analysis to answer complex questions. You should have a strong background in delivering actionable insights to clients based on your analyses.What you will be doing
